name: UNoiseField
doc: Defines a perlin noise scalar value if the sample is within a box

MinRange: The initial function value between 0 and 1 will be scaled between MinRange and MaxRange
MaxRange: The initial function value between 0 and 1 will be scaled between MinRange and MaxRange
Transform: Transform of the box in which the perlin noise will be defined

methods.name: SetNoiseField
